includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: After the leader of their clique dies in mysterious circumstances, a group of teenagers begin to receive texts from a shadowy figure threatening to reveal their darkest secrets. Tense teen drama starring Lucy Hale and Ashley Benson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After the leader of their group dies, four teenagers begin to receive texts threatening to reveal their darkest secrets. Tense teen drama.

includedAssets.title: Season 4

title: Pretty Little Liars Seasons 1-6
synopsis: A group of teenagers try to solve the murder of their best friend and defeat an anonymous stalker threatening to reveal their darkest secrets. Teen mystery drama starring Lucy Hale and Ashley Benson.
